page.description: The additional resource files allows you to specify the names of any additional resource files. These are files in the Web Project folder that you want to ensure get published every time you publish the UX component.

section.description: If this component has been specified as the 'initial' component in a PhoneGap project then these files are automatically copied into the PhoneGap project that is submitted to PhoneGap build. The files entered into this list must be in the form of a cr-lf list of relative filenames (relative to the Web Project folder).
